=======
Changes
=======

1.3 (2012-05-02)
================

- Use the grokcore.component API for registering components.

1.2 (2011-04-04)
================

- Minor test fixes.

1.1 (2011-01-20)
================

- Use zope.errorview in the functional tests to get rid of the zope.app.http
  dependency.

1.0 (2011-01-03)
================

- Factor out form grok base package
